Title

Source: R/reweigh.R
reweigh.Rd

Title

Usage

reweigh(
  ssp_y,
  reg_tz,
  hh_s,
  per_s,
  bm,
  param,
  reg_sample = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE,
  max_iter = 300,
  max_ratio = 5,
  min_ratio = 0.2,
  relative_gap = 0.01,
  absolute_diff = 10,
  parallel = TRUE,
  output = NULL
)

Arguments

parallel

If TRUE (the default), the reweighing algorithm is run in parallel for all regions. Otherwise, the sequential option is used (which in most cases takes much longer.

output

A folder where to save the output for each ssp-year combination as specified in ssp_y. The default (NULL) is not to save any output.
